blocks.name: cmuv
blocks.content: The universe of a model.

blocks.name: cmvl
blocks.content: The set of valuations.

blocks.name: cmvsb
blocks.content: Substitution for a valuation.

blocks.name: cmfsh
blocks.content: The freshness relation of a model.

blocks.name: cmfr
blocks.content: The set of freshness relations.

blocks.name: cmevl
blocks.content: The evaluation function of a model.

blocks.name: cmdl
blocks.content: The set of models.

blocks.name: cusyn
blocks.content: The syntax function applied to elements of the model.

blocks.name: cgmdl
blocks.content: The set of models in a grammatical formal system.

blocks.name: cmitp
blocks.content: The interpretation function of the model.

blocks.name: cmfitp
blocks.content: The evaluation function derived from the interpretation.

blocks.name: df-muv
blocks.content: Define the universe of a model. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mfsh
blocks.content: Define the freshness relation of a model. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mevl
blocks.content: Define the evaluation function of a model. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mvl
blocks.content: Define the set of valuations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mvsb
blocks.content: Define substitution applied to a valuation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mvsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmvsb, cmpt(s0, universe, coprab(s1, s2, s3, w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), crn(cfv(cmsub, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)))), wral(s4, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cdm(cfv(cmevl, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s4))))), wceq(cv(s3), cmpt(s4, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cmevl, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s1), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mvsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ mVSubst =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < < s1, s2 >, s3 > |((s1 ‚àà ran((mSubst ` s0))‚àß s2 ‚àà(mVL ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(mVR ` s0), s2[dom((mEval ` s0))](s1 `((mVH ` s0)` s4)))‚àß s3 =(s4 ‚àà(mVR ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2[(mEval ` s0)](s1 `((mVH ` s0)` s4)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-mfrel
blocks.content: Define the set of freshness relations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mfrel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmfr, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cpw(cxp(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(ccnv(cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cfv(cmvt, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cin(cpw(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0))), cfn), wrex(s4, cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), wss(cv(s3), cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s4)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mfrel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ mFRel =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà P(((mUV ` s0)√ó(mUV ` s0)))|(`' s1 = s1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(mVT ` s0), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(P((mUV ` s0))‚ãÇ Fin), ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà((mUV ` s0)" { s2 }), s3 ‚äÜ(s1 " { s4 })))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

  |- wceq(cmdl, crab(s0, cmfs, wsbc(s1, cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cmex, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)), wsbc(s4, cfv(cmevl, cv(s0)), wsbc(s5, cfv(cmfsh, cv(s0)), wa(w3a(wss(cv(s1), cxp(cfv(cmtc, cv(s0)), universe)), wcel(cv(s5), cfv(cmfr, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s4), co(cv(s1), cpm, cxp(cv(s3), cfv(cmex, cv(s0)))))), wral(s6, cv(s3), wa(w3a(wral(s7, cv(s2), wss(cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s6), cv(s7)))), cima(cv(s1), csn(cfv(c1st, cv(s7)))))), wral(s8, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), wbr(cop(cv(s6), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s8))), cv(s4), cfv(cv(s6), cv(s8)))), wal(s9, wal(s10, wal(s11, wi(wcel(cotp(cv(s9), cv(s10), cv(s11)), cfv(cmax, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wal(s8, wal(s12, wi(wbr(cv(s8), cv(s9), cv(s12)), wbr(cfv(cv(s6), cv(s8)), cv(s5), cfv(cv(s6), cv(s12)))))), wss(cv(s10), cima(cdm(cv(s4)), csn(cv(s6))))), wbr(cv(s6), cdm(cv(s4)), cv(s11)))))))), w3a(wral(s13, crn(cfv(cmsub, cv(s0))), wral(s7, cfv(cmex, cv(s0)), wal(s8, wi(wbr(cop(cv(s13), cv(s6)), cfv(cmvsb, cv(s0)), cv(s8)), wceq(cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s6), cfv(cv(s13), cv(s7))))), cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s8), cv(s7))))))))), wral(s14, cv(s3), wral(s7, cv(s2), wi(wceq(cres(cv(s6), cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s7))), cres(cv(s14), cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s7)))), wceq(cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s6), cv(s7)))), cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s14), cv(s7)))))))), wral(s8, cv(s1), wral(s7, cv(s2), wi(wss(cima(cv(s6), cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s7))), cima(cv(s5), csn(cv(s8)))), wss(cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s6), cv(s7)))), cima(cv(s5), csn(cv(s8))))))))))))))))))
  -| diffss(s11, s9)

blocks.name: df-musyn
blocks.content: Define the syntax typecode function for the model universe. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-gmdl
blocks.content: Define the set of models of a grammatical formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-gmdl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cgmdl, crab(s0, cin(cmgfs, cmdl), w3a(wral(s1, cfv(cmtc, cv(s0)), wss(cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1))), cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(cfv(cmsy, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wral(s2, cfv(cmuv, cv(s1)), wral(s3, cfv(cmuv, cv(s1)), wb(wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cmfsh, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cmfsh, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cusyn, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))), wral(s4, cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)), wral(s5, cfv(cmex, cv(s0)), wceq(cima(cfv(cmevl, cv(s0)), csn(cop(cv(s4), cv(s5)))), cin(cima(cfv(cmevl, cv(s0)), csn(cop(cv(s4), cfv(cfv(cmesy, cv(s0)), cv(s5))))), cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(c1st, cv(s5)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-gmdl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ mGMdl = { s0 ‚àà(mGFS ‚ãÇ mMdl)|(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(mTC ` s0),((mUV ` s0)" { s1 })‚äÜ((mUV ` s0)" {((mSyn ` s0)` s1)}))‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(mUV ` s1), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(mUV ` s1),(s2[(mFresh ` s0)]s3 ‚Üî s2[(mFresh ` s0)]((mUSyn ` s0)` s3))))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(mVL ` s0), ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà(mEx ` s0),((mEval ` s0)" { < s4, s5 > })=(((mEval ` s0)" { < s4,((mESyn ` s0)` s5)> })‚ãÇ((mUV ` s0)" {(1st ` s5)})))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-mitp
blocks.content: Define the interpretation function for a model. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mitp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cmitp, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cmsa, cv(s0)), cmpt(s2, cixp(s3, cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(cfv(cmty, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))), cio(s4, wrex(s5, cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cres(cv(s5), cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s4), co(cv(s5), cfv(cmevl, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mitp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ mItp =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(mSA ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà √ó(s3 ‚àà((mVars ` s0)` s1),((mUV ` s0)" {((mType ` s0)` s3)}))‚Ü¶ iota(s4, ‚àÉ(s5 ‚àà(mVL ` s0),(s2 =(s5 |`((mVars ` s0)` s1))‚àß s4 =(s5[(mEval ` s0)]s1)))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-mfitp
blocks.content: Define a function that produces the evaluation function, given the interpretation function for a model. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mfitp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7, setvar s8) {
  |- wceq(cmfitp, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cixp(s2, cfv(cmsa, cv(s0)), co(cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(s2)))), cmap, cixp(s3, cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(cfv(cmty, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))), crio(s4, co(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), cpm, cxp(cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)), cfv(cmex, cv(s0)))), wral(s5, cfv(cmvl, cv(s0)), w3a(wral(s6, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), wbr(cop(cv(s5), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s6))), cv(s4), cfv(cv(s5), cv(s6)))), wal(s7, wal(s2, wal(s8, wi(wbr(cv(s7), cfv(cmst, cv(s0)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s8))), wbr(cop(cv(s5), cv(s7)), cv(s4), cfv(cv(s1), cmpt(s3, cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), co(cv(s5), cv(s4), cfv(cv(s8), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s3))))))))))), wral(s7, cfv(cmex, cv(s0)), wceq(cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s5), cv(s7)))), cin(cima(cv(s4), csn(cop(cv(s5), cfv(cfv(cmesy, cv(s0)), cv(s7))))), cima(cfv(cmuv, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(c1st, cv(s7)))))))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s7)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s8)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
